meta.title: Best Dogs for Apartments: Top Breeds for Small Spaces
meta.description: Living in an apartment? These dog breeds are quiet, low-energy, and perfect for small spaces. See our top picks.

intro.title: Finding the Perfect Apartment Dog
intro.description: Not all dogs are happy in small spaces. The best apartment dogs are generally quiet, have lower energy levels, and are polite with neighbors.

ranking_table.one_line_reason: Quiet, low energy, and loves to lounge.
Charming, small, and doesn't need much exercise.

breed_snippets.description: Frenchies are the ultimate apartment dogs. They rarely bark and are happy with short walks.
These spaniels are true lap dogs. They are friendly with everyone and content indoors.

cta.quiz_anchor: Still not sure? Take the Lifestyle Match Quiz to find your perfect breed.
cta.secondary_anchor: Check out our guide on Potty Training in an Apartment.
